page.title: 11Stock Gaylard house & park
page.content: Stock Gaylard is an ancient parish although the hamlet the little church serves is a mile and a half away at Kingstag. The present Stock House was built in 1720 and is the home of the{Yeatman family.It is surrounded by a hundred acre deer park.At present there are 140 fallow deer in the park which are kept for 'decoration'. These deer can often be seen from the road and there is a local saying that{'if the deer are close to the {road fence it is going to rain'}and this often proves to be true...... The wooden field gates on the Yeatman estate are unmistakable being white,five-barred with a full depth,black Y in the centre.
